sourcesContent:
import Input from './components/Input'
import Button from './components/Button'

import { Container, Content, Row } from './styles'
import { useState } from 'react'


const App = () => {
  const [currentNumber, setCurrentNumber] = useState('0');

  const handleAddNumber = (number) => {
    setCurrentNumber(prev => ``)
  }

  return (
    <Container>
      <Content>
        <Input value={currentNumber}/>
        <Row>
          <Button label = "C" />
          <Button label = "%" />
          <Button label = "/" />
          <Button label = "*" />
        </Row>
        <Row>
          <Button label = "9" />
          <Button label = "8" />
          <Button label = "7" />
          <Button label = "-" />
        </Row>
        <Row>
          <Button label = "6" />
          <Button label = "5" />
          <Button label = "4" />
          <Button label = "+" />
        </Row>
        <Row>
          <Button label = "3" />
          <Button label = "2" />
          <Button label = "1" />
          <Button label = "=" />
        </Row>
      </Content>
    </Container>
  );
}

export default App;
